project-basis: Firstly I started on my own to create the basics using Unreal Engine and a little bit of C++, now it has evolved so I called in the help of some of my mate, Lewis Bryand and James Davies.
project-challenges: The game as a whole is a massive challenge haha, for now the challenge is compiling the server code that I can run the game on.
project-future-plans: Full Steam integration and a dedicated functional server to run the game on.
project-purpose: For now, it's a multiplayer game with a main hub to chat and meetup.
project-inspiration: I wanted to create a game, a world that I could make and edit, so my friends and I could hang out and mess about online.
project-lessons-learned: Teamwork, game design and level designing.
project-subtitle: Getting the best aspects from RPG's, FPS and Racing Games
